title: Success Stories
subtitle: Real businesses that used our platform to validate and refine their ideas

submitForm.title: Submit Your Success Story
submitForm.description: Share how you built your startup and how our platform helped you succeed. Selected cases will be featured on our blog.
submitForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your journey, challenges, and how you overcame them

submitSuccess.title: Success Story Submitted!
submitSuccess.description: Thank you for sharing your story. Our team will review it and contact you soon.

case1.description: An eco-friendly food delivery service that needed to validate their sustainable packaging model and pricing strategy.
case1.result: After using our platform, GreenDeliver pivoted their packaging strategy and secured $1.5M in seed funding within 3 months.

case2.description: A financial education platform targeting young adults with personalized learning paths and gamified experiences.
case2.result: Our analysis helped FinMentor refine their target demographic and feature set, resulting in 215% user growth in the first year.

case3.description: A healthcare startup focusing on preventive care through AI-powered monitoring and personalized recommendations.
case3.result: Using our validation tools, HealthTrack identified key partnerships opportunities and has now expanded to 5 countries.

cta.title: Your Success Story Could Be Next
